title: refactor!: rewrite old CapsuleKey as trait alias
body:
This removes issues the old CapsuleKey faced, such as no Hash impl.

Fixes #39

title: feat!: add lifetimes to FnOnce callbacks
body:
Helps to reduce some otherwise unneeded clones.

Fixes #38

refactor!: rework internal modules, features, and code docs
body:
**MIGRATION**:
- `better-api` feature has been renamed to `experimental-api`
- `Container::with_write_txn` and `Container::with_read_txn` are now feature-gated under `experimental-txn` feature

title: perf: improve capsule id clone implementation
feat: cloneable side effects
refactor!: switch SideEffect to GAT lifetime
body: Fixes #3 (thanks for the initial idea of the workaround @0e4ef622!)

title: refactor!: move side effects to their own crate
feat!: add side effect transactions
ci: add sponsorship info and updater
feat!: remove clone restriction on capsules
perf: wrap container values in Arc for faster clones
feat: add dynamic capsule support
body:
Fixes #9 

TODO:
- [x] Fix all clippy lints with --no-default-features and also --features=logging
- [x] Switch `InternalKey` usages to `Arc<InternalKey>` so we can use cheap `Arc::clone`s everywhere and always have an owned instance instead of battling references and trying to minimize clones
- [x] Add dynamic capsules test (include static capsules in this mix)
- [x] Go over code changes to make sure nothing sloppy was introduced (this first pass was just to get it to compile, needs some cleanup)
